subject: In regards to Order #SSN3836
description_text:
Hi,

I forgot to purchase an adaptor plate and a desktop fixing clamp for the
shifter when I placed the order. Could you please add these two items and
charge me the extra? (should be an additional $33.80)

Many thanks,
Henry

conversations.body_text: Hi, upon review I'd like to cancel this order. Other than not getting an adaptor plate and a desktop fixing clamp, I didn't use the code BLACK45 to get the pre-sale discount.

Alright, we'll add the adapter plate and the Desktop Fixed for you. Additionally, you didn't use the BLACK45 discount but applied a $31.75 discount instead, resulting in a difference of $13.25. Therefore, you only need to pay $20.55. You can click this link to complete the payment.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-2
